verses.text: A Song of Degrees. They that trust in the Lord shall beas Mount Zion: He that dwells in Jerusalem shall never be moved.
The mountains are round about her, And sothe Lord is round about his people, From henceforth and even forever.
For the Lord will not allow the rod of sinners To be upon the lot of the righteous; Lest the righteous should stretch forth Their hands to iniquity.
Do good, O Lord, to them that aregood, And to them that areupright in heart.
But them that turn aside to crooked ways The Lord will lead away with the workers of iniquity: Butpeace shall beupon Israel.
